channel.title: General Fashion Design Csharp Cookies Skull on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i need something to do.. or something
item.description: so I was trying to learn how use cookies in csharp and I noticed that I always needed a cookie displayer - not one that shows what cookies are residing on the client - ut one that shows the cookies the page is sending to the client. so anyway. so I made one. it is called cookie destroyer: check it out here also there are pictures from last night here. I "made" the jacket I am wearing - I had purchased the jacket at salvation army for 3.
